trans-unit.target: TEXT_GAIUSA305_00737_SEQ_00<tab>Teteroon appears to have finished his gift for Buscarron.

TEXT_GAIUSA305_00737_SEQ_01<tab>Teteroon has finally finished his gift for Buscarron. Deliver the special brand of Qiqirn beverage back to the eponymous proprietor of Buscarron's Druthers in the South Shroud.

TEXT_GAIUSA305_00737_SEQ_02<tab>Buscarron is delighted to receive the hard liquor brewed by his old friend. However, he is less delighted when he realizes it would be best to age it a year before finally cracking it open.
TEXT_GAIUSA305_00737_TODO_00<tab>Deliver the Qiqirn firewater to Buscarron at Buscarron's Druthers.
TEXT_GAIUSA305_00737_TETEROON_000_000<tab>Teteroon make firewater! Good, good firewater! You take to Buscaroon. Good firewater for good Buscaroon.
TEXT_GAIUSA305_00737_TETEROON_000_001<tab>Tell Buscaroon no drink now. Tell put away one year. One year make best flavor.
TEXT_GAIUSA305_00737_TETEROON_000_002<tab><sigh> Teteroon hopes Buscaroon happy. Teteroon gives Buscaroon thankies. Many, many thankies. You tell Buscaroon.
TEXT_GAIUSA305_00737_TETEROON_000_003<tab>Teteroon make big shop someday. Biggest shop in Eorzea. Make many, many sparklies. All thanks to good Buscaroon.
TEXT_GAIUSA305_00737_BUSCARRON_000_010<tab>Ah, you've returned. Thank you for seeing Teteroon's belongings to him. ...What's this? For me?
TEXT_GAIUSA305_00737_BUSCARRON_000_011<tab>Qiqirn firewater! So he remembers my fondness for the drink, does he? Why that old... He... I... Aw, bloody hells! Who's cutting onions back there!?

TEXT_GAIUSA305_00737_BUSCARRON_000_012<tab>He says to shelve it for a year, does he? Aye, that sounds about right. I hate to have to wait, but I reckon it'll be worth it. This stuff has an aroma and body unlike any other drink I know.
TEXT_GAIUSA305_00737_BUSCARRON_000_013<tab>It's going to be a looong year. What say you come back then, friend? We'll see if we can't make it through this bottle together.
